com.mslab.encryptsms.misc

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mslab.encryptsms.misc.Conversation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.lang.Comparable<Conversation>

    public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Conversation>, android.os.Parcelable
    This class is a object-representation of the used conversations. It supports the usage of the databases by generalising the interface.
    Author:
    Paul Kramer
